definition: to meet by chance (usually with misfortune)/classifier for events: time, turn, incident
beset by a series of mishaps (idiom)

sentences.english: And Lin Bicheng exorbitant is conceited, meet with repeatedly setback.
sentences.chinese: 而林必成過分的自負，屢遭挫折。

sentences.english: Acer was also criticized for its slow inventory turnover.
sentences.chinese: 此外，宏基還因存貨週轉率低而屢遭批評。

sentences.english: Steelmaking cities in the American industrial heartland were battered over these decades.
sentences.chinese: 美國工業腹地的鋼鐵生產城市在這幾十年中屢遭重創。

sentences.english: Britain’s subsidised plant has suffered repeated delays.
sentences.chinese: 英國接受補貼的電廠項目屢遭推遲。

sentences.english: After many failures, he started drinking and in the end he drank himself to death.
sentences.chinese: 屢遭失敗後他開始飲起酒來，最後縱飲而死。

sentences.english: There the old man suffered many humiliations.
sentences.chinese: 這位老人在那裏屢遭恥辱。
